snippet: The additions to a supervisory council responsible for monitoring the country’s nuclear negotiating team appeared to strengthen the influence of critics of the talks between Iran and world powers.
abstract: Two members of Iran’s hard-line-dominated Parliament are added to a supervisory council responsible for monitoring country’s nuclear negotiating team; additions appear to strengthen influence of critics of talks between Iran and world powers.
lead_paragraph: The additions to a supervisory council responsible for monitoring the country’s nuclear negotiating team appeared to strengthen the influence of critics of the talks between Iran and world powers.
